attributes.action: Make St David's Day (March 1st) a statutory bank holiday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would help save the economy millions in sick days between Christmas and Easter as everyone would have a guaranteed day off to look forward to. It's a day to celebrate our culture and the whole of Britain should be allowed to join in on the celebrations!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
